name: Qoppa Software
tag_list: pdf, software, libraries, applications, apps, markup, view, reader, edit, workflow, digital-signature
overview:
Qoppa Software® was founded in 2002 in Atlanta and specializes in the development of high-end libraries and applications to work with PDF documents.

Qoppa Software offers a suite of products that cover every aspect of PDF processes and integrate seamlessly into document workflows. Our products are carefully designed and developed to provide the highest level of performance and reliability and are proven to be industry leaders. We support all major platforms including Windows, Unix/Linux (Ubuntu, Suse, Solaris, Fedora, AIX and others), Mac OSX and any other platform that has full support for Java™.

We provide solutions to companies all over the world ranging from small businesses to Fortune 500 companies. As a small, highly focused company we remain flexible to work with our customers individually. This allows us to deliver a solution that fits each customer’s unique needs in terms of licensing, implementation and deployment. Additionally, we pride ourselves in offering high-level, responsive technical support at an expert level, providing access to our development staff.
